items.name: Create broken function (should fail validation)
items.description: Create a TypeScript file at src/lib/broken.ts with a function that has a syntax error - missing closing brace. The file should NOT compile.
acceptance_criteria: Function must have deliberate syntax error

items.name: Create perfect security implementation (high threshold)
items.description: Create a simple authentication function at src/lib/auth.ts. The function checkPassword(input, hash) should compare passwords. This will be judged with a 99% threshold which will likely fail.
acceptance_criteria: Should take input and hash parameters

criteria: Must use constant-time comparison to prevent timing attacks
Must use bcrypt or argon2 for hashing
